attributes.action: Protect Course fish stocks in the U.K
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the cultural differences between fresh water anglers in the U.K .and those in Eastern Europe.
I wish to petition parliament on the grounds that awareness needs to be brought to  Eastern European migrants residing  in the U.K that they may not kill any Course fish caught and take home for  eating as is the custom in their home countries.
Fresh water Course angling is a sport partcipated in by  millions in this country purely for enjoyment .Immediate action needs to be taken and if necessary penalties introduced to prevent this sport and the wild creatures it is reliant on from being destroyed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
